title: DeployExecutorOptions

RequireApproval.description: In what scenarios should the CLI ask for approval

StackActivityProgress.description: Supported display modes for stack deployment activity

description: Options to use with cdk deploy

assetMetadata.description: Include "aws:asset:*" CloudFormation metadata for resources that use assets

assetParallelism.description: Whether to build/publish assets in parallel.

assetPrebuild.description: Whether to build all assets before deploying the first stack (useful for failing Docker builds)

caBundlePath.description:
Path to CA certificate to use when validating HTTPS
requests.

changeSetName.description:
Optional name to use for the CloudFormation change set.
If not provided, a name will be generated automatically.

ci.default: - `false` unless the environment variable `CI` is set
ci.description: Whether we are on a CI system

color.default: - `true` unless the environment variable `NO_COLOR` is set
color.description: Show colors and other style from console output

concurrency.description: Maximum number of simultaneous deployments (dependency permitting) to execute.

debug.description:
enable emission of additional debugging information, such as creation stack
traces of tokens

ec2Creds.description: Force trying to fetch EC2 instance credentials

exclusively.description: Only perform action on the given stack

execute.description:
Whether to execute the ChangeSet
Not providing `execute` parameter will result in execution of ChangeSet

force.description: Always deploy, even if templates are identical.

ignoreErrors.description: Ignores synthesis errors, which will likely produce an invalid output

json.description:
Use JSON output instead of YAML when templates are printed
to STDOUT

lookups.description:
Perform context lookups.

Synthesis fails if this is disabled and context lookups need
to be performed

notificationArns.description: ARNs of SNS topics that CloudFormation will notify with stack related events

outputsFile.default: - Outputs are not written to any file
outputsFile.description: Path to file where stack outputs will be written after a successful deploy as JSON

parameters.description: Additional parameters for CloudFormation at deploy time

pathMetadata.description: Include "aws:cdk:path" CloudFormation metadata for each resource

profile.description: Use the indicated AWS profile as the default environment

progress.description:
Display mode for stack activity events

The default in the CLI is StackActivityProgress.BAR. But since this is an API
it makes more sense to set the default to StackActivityProgress.EVENTS

proxy.description:
Use the indicated proxy. Will read from
HTTPS_PROXY environment if specified

requireApproval.description: What kind of security changes require approval

reuseAssets.description: Reuse the assets with the given asset IDs

roleArn.description: Role to pass to CloudFormation for deployment

staging.description:
Copy assets to the output directory

Needed for local debugging the source files with SAM CLI

strict.description: Do not construct stacks with warnings

toolkitStackName.description: Name of the toolkit stack to use/deploy

usePreviousParameters.description:
Use previous values for unspecified parameters

If not set, all parameters must be specified for every deployment.
